1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Umm Hani' bint Abu Talib narrated that :When it was the year of the Conquest (of Makkah), the Messenger of Allah got up to perform a bath and Fatimah screened him. Then he took his garment and wrapped himself in it (such that it became like the towel used to dry oneself)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمِنْدِيلِ بَعْدَ الْوُضُوءِ وَبَعْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: (Drying oneself with) a cloth after ablution or bathing
